Colloquium – “Terror through networks: cyberterrorism”

Fecha: 28 of august Hora: 2:00 pm - 4:00 pm Lugar: Music Room, Building F

The Interdisciplinary Studies Institute invites the Externadista community and all interested in the topic to participate in this event. Admission is free

The Colloquium aims to analyze a relatively new threat to our society: cyberterrorism – understood as the criminal use of information technology and the web to promote or develop terrorism.

First, Cyberterrorism will be explained and how the legal systems around the world have addressed it. Next, the many ways terrorism has moved to computer systems and the web will be addressed.

The event will conclude with an approach to the typical widespread panic effects caused by terrorism and how they, in the cyber world, can multiply exponentially.
